mapper.select: SELECT o.id as id,o.userid as userid,o.title as title,o.content as content, o.location as location,o.time as time, o.type as type,o.messageCount as messageCount,u.iconUrl as usericonurl, u.nickname as username FROM (SELECT * FROM group_mail WHERE userid = #{0} AND state = 0 ) o ,user u WHERE o.userid = u.id
